main event: On September 3, 1958, an unidentified flying object was detected by ground radar over Baffin Island.
interesting points: The object was detected at an altitude of 6500 to 7000 feet,The speed of the object was recorded at 300 knots,The duration of the observation was 39 seconds,The object was described as circular or arrow-shaped,The object disappeared quickly to the north after the observation.
